item.name: Mouse Keys
Important:
item.appendix: At least one pointing device must be connected when you use Mouse Keys.
(Excluded devices by "Karabiner core settings > Exclude devices" are not counted.)

item.item:
Mouse Keys Mode v2 You can move mouse pointer by d+hjkl keys, and scroll by d+s+hjkl keys.
Usage:
Move pointer by: * Left: D down -> H down -> H up * Down: D down -> J down -> J up * Up: D down -> K down -> K up * Right: D down -> L down -> L up
The hjkl keys also act as mouse keys when you hold d+hjkl keys down. (You can adjust timeout by "__BlockUntilKeyUp__ Timeout" in Parameters tab.
Use S key to enable scroll. ("S"croll) * D+S+HJKL: Scroll wheel.
Use F key to increase speed. ("F"ast) * D+F+HJKL: High-speed movement. * D+F+S+HJKL: High-speed scroll wheel.
Click by: * D+V: Left click. * D+B: Middle click. * D+N: Right click.
Warp cursor position: * D+I: Move mouse cursor to the center of the frontmost app's window. remap.mouse_keys_mode_2
